code: /* Base */import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{doLogout}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import{useAuthContext}from'../hooks/useAuthContext';import{Nav,Navbar,Button}from'react-bootstrap';/* Web */import axios from'axios';/* Styling */import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function NavigationBar(){/* Declaring State Object and Constant variables */var _useAuthContext=useAuthContext(),state=_useAuthContext.state,dispatch=_useAuthContext.dispatch;var url="http://localhost:8000/user/logout";var navigate=useNavigate();/* Declaring Event handler */var handleClick=function handleClick(){axios.post(url,{username:state.username}).then(function(res){console.log(res);console.log('Logout successful!');dispatch(doLogout());sessionStorage.removeItem("sessionName");navigate('/login');}).catch(function(err){if(err.response){/* The request was made and the server responded with a status code that falls out of the range of 2xx */console.log(Object.values(err.response.data.error).join(', '));}else if(err.request){/* The request was made but no response was received */console.log(err.request);}else{/* Something happened in setting up the request that triggered an Error */console.log(err.message);}console.log(err.config);});};/* Render */return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar,{bg:"light",variant:"light",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Brand,{children:"Board Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"me-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/tictactoe/lobby/".concat(state.username),children:"Tictactoe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"/",children:"Catan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"logout_button",variant:"primary",onClick:handleClick,children:"Logout"})]})]})});}
